page.content: The Games I Play at Home,Nicola Tripp. At home I play Hide and Seek.One person counts whilst covering their eyes.The rest hide and when the person who is on has counted to a hundred they come to lor you and the first person they find is on. Another game that we play at home is Polo.One person is on and chooses a subject like colours and the others choose which thing they want like the colour red. Without letting the person who is on know which word belongs to each peron,one person calls out what all the words are.Then the person who is on calls out one of the words and has a race back and forwards with the person that the word belongs to and the first person to finish and shout Polo is on.
